items.summary: Update the PWA install prompt UI to make installation feel “one-tap” and remove confusing dismissal wording: in `frontend/src/components/PWAInstallCallout.tsx`, make the primary action a prominent "Install" button (or "Install Vibechat"), and remove the current "Dismiss" button text from the UI.

Ensure users on browsers/devices that do not support programmatic install still have a clear, easy path: when `isInstallable` is false in `PWAInstallCallout`, show short English instructions explaining how to install via the browser menu (e.g., "Add to Home Screen" / "Install App") and that availability depends on the browser/device.

Add a low-friction way to temporarily hide the install callout without using the word "Dismiss" (e.g., a small "Not now" text button or an X icon), and persist that choice locally so returning users are not repeatedly shown the callout after hiding it.
